sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.capture

Class CaptureConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.capture.CaptureConfiguration

  • public class CaptureConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Object representing a captureMonitor sequence to perform

    • Method Detail

      • newColdFastCalibration

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newColdFastCalibration()
        Create a new CALIBRATION_COLD_FAST session. Exposure is automatically set to fastest fps, frame limit is the default (1000), temperature limit is 30 Celsius and it is a single attempt.
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newColdSlowCalibration

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newColdSlowCalibration()
        Create a new CALIBRATION_COLD_SLOW session. Exposure is automatically set to slowest fps, frame limit is the default (1000), temperature limit is 30 Celsius and it is a single attempt.
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newCoolDownSession

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newCoolDownSession(double temperatureLimit,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                java.lang.Integer attemptLimit)
        Create a new COOLDOWN session
        Parameters:
        temperatureLimit - Minimum temperature to end the session
        attemptLimit - (Optional) Attempts to cool down (default is 1) [minutes]
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newDataSession

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newDataSession(int frameLimit,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            java.lang.Long targetExposure,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            java.lang.Double temperatureLimit,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            java.lang.Integer attemptLimit,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            java.lang.Boolean enableSignificance)
        Create a new DATA session
        Parameters:
        frameLimit - End captureMonitor after this many frames
        targetExposure - (Optional) Desired sensor exposure in nanoseconds (default is optimum fps)
        temperatureLimit - (Optional) Maximum temperature to end the session (default is 40 C)
        attemptLimit - (Optional) Repeat this many times (default is 1)
        enableSignificance - (Optional) Enables statistical significance (default is true)
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newHotFastCalibration

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newHotFastCalibration()
        Create a new CALIBRATION_HOT_FAST session. Exposure is automatically set to fastest fps, frame limit is the default (1000), temperature limit is 50 Celsius and it is a single attempt.
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newHotSlowCalibration

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newHotSlowCalibration()
        Create a new CALIBRATION_HOT_SLOW session. Exposure is automatically set to slowest fps, frame limit is the default (1000), temperature limit is 50 Celsius and it is a single attempt.
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newOptimizationSession

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newOptimizationSession(@Nullable
                                                                    java.lang.Double temperatureLimit)
        Create a new OPTIMIZE_DUTY_CYCLE session. Discovers sensor exposure / frame rate that maximizes the duty cycle between exposure time and dead time (not possible for devices that do not support manual control)
        Parameters:
        temperatureLimit - (Optional) Maximum temperature to end the session (default is 40 C)
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use

      • newWarmUpSession

        @NonNull
public static CaptureConfiguration newWarmUpSession(double temperatureLimit,
                                                              @Nullable
                                                              java.lang.Integer attemptLimit,
                                                              @Nullable
                                                              java.lang.Integer frameLimit)
        Create a new WARMUP session.
        Parameters:
        temperatureLimit - Maximum temperature to end the session
        attemptLimit - (Optional) Attempts to heat up (default is 1)
        frameLimit - (Optional) End captureMonitor after this many frames (default is 1000)
        Returns:
        A captureMonitor configuration object ready for use
